price: Wakasema: Je! Wewe umeifanyia haya miungu yetu, ewe Ibrahim?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ
footnotes: Baada ya kwisha mhudhurisha, wakasema: Ni wewe ulio itenda haya miungu yetu, ewe Ibrahim?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
